title: Traditional Balance Kitchen Weighing Scale
author: Carol Douglas; Susan hamilton
description: Traditional Cast Iron Balance Kitchen Weighing Scale with an Acacia base to protect your worktop from scratches. Dishwasher safe, stainless steel bowl.
cleaned_text: Traditional Cast Iron Balance Kitchen Weighing Scale Product number: 19791 Oozing traditional design qualities these perfect-balance, cast iron scales from KitchenCraft have been brought up to date to fit in with modern kitchens. These scales feature an attractive acacia wood base, which is designed to save your worktop from scratches. The stainless steel bowl is much easier to clean than brass, and can even go in the dishwasher for added convenience. There are also Metric weights available separately to accompany them. About KitchenCraft Founded in 1850 by Thomas Plant as a specialist in ironmongery and metal products, the company was renamed KitchenCraft in the 1990s to better describe the vast array of products now produced. From hot beverages, to baking and food prep, KitchenCraft produce a large line of products designed to both add colour and style to your kitchen, while making your life that little bit easier. Product dimensions 34cm L. x
